  • Connect with us

Meet the Team

We are a cross-functional Agile team including a Product Owner, a Scrum Master, 2 Policy Analysts, a User Experience Researcher/Designer, and 2 Developers. The team was formed to support producers of consumer goods and purchasers of mineral resources in proving responsible sourcing via verifiable credentials.

Contact us

Having questions/suggestions/feedback? We would love to hear from you!

Email: MinesDigitalTrust@gov.bc.ca
